title: Case-based instructional design competency development program for pre-service mathematics teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design theory and mathematics content knowledge
context.additional_context: Case-based discussions and project implementation in smartphone-centric, technology-constrained environments.

learning_goals: Three or more instructional design approaches considering learner characteristics, environmental factors, and content elements can be differentiated by analyzing actual classroom cases
Mathematics lesson design documents can be created and presented based on design insights gathered through group discussions
Practical skills to iteratively improve instructional design drafts two or more times through feedback incorporation can be achieved

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
